name: vor-image-client
description: Light-weight client for Rasperry PI 2 to handle web camera

scripts.test: NODE_PATH=. PORT=9090 SOCKET_SERVER=http://localhost:5000 npm run mocha || exit 0
scripts.test-watch: nodemon -x 'npm run eslint && npm run test'
scripts.start: SOCKET_SERVER=http://localhost:8080 LISTEN_TYPE=button LISTEN_ID=button-1 SEND_TYPE=3D SEND_ID=3D npm run server
scripts.watch: nodemon  -x 'npm run eslint && npm run start'
